questions: Can my employer fire me for missing work do to jury duty?
Is There Protection For My Employment While I Serve As a Juror?
Will I be fired for serving on jury duty?
answers: NJSA 2B:20.17 prohibits an employer from penalizing you because you serve as a juror. Penalties for a violation of this statute include the possibility of a criminal charge, as a disorderly persons offense, and a possible civil action for monetary damages and for reinstatement of employment.
